I fucking hate Masato anyway, so this is good stuff. He treats his mother like actual garbage even in the source material, yet we still see a bunch of 15-year-old cucks defending him with the most retarded excuses ever. I appreciate doujins where Masato doesn't treat Mamako like trash, but I can also appreciate doujins where he gets cucked and/or killed. I believe Masato's shitty personality is one of the reasons why there are so few ero-doujins of this series despite Mamako's huge potential as one of the hottest milfs in history.

I will be honest here. I absolutely loved the fap factor and the art. The expressions were super lewd. I loved everything except the plot. I found it rather triggering and lame. I know she is a milf but I feel like the writer made her go way beyond. There were many points in the plot which were disgusting. The prime one is the one where she stayed with that "child" who raped her as a maid and even sent her son her sex tape where she tells him that she will come back home only after getting impregnated by this "child". The limit was further crossed when she was getting fucked by a faggot friend of that "child" and had no issues. I know many of you are gonna spam "if you find this disgusting then don't come here". My answer: I have seen and read a fuck lot of hentai of various characters and milfs including Mamako, but in those plots she was in her limit and was only having sex with one guy. I have no problem with that. But I find group violation disgusting and I can't help it.
